meanings.definition: To make a high-pitched, short, sharp sound.
meanings.sent1: The tiny bell was pinging softly in the breeze.
meanings.sent2: I heard the metal spoon pinging against the glass.
meanings.sent3: The pinging of the microwave signaled my popcorn was ready.
meanings.sent4: The raindrops pinging on the roof created a soothing melody.
meanings.sent5: The alarm clock pinging woke me up from my nap.

meanings.definition: To send a quick, short message to a computer or network device to check if it is reachable.
meanings.sent1: I am pinging the server to see if it responds.
meanings.sent2: The IT technician is pinging the IP address for connectivity.
meanings.sent3: I keep pinging my friend's phone to annoy him playfully.
meanings.sent4: The email system pinging back and forth with updates.
meanings.sent5: Pinging the website helped troubleshoot the network issue.
